headline: Medical device maker Becton Dickinson cuts 2025 profit forecast on potential tariff hit
summary: "The estimated tariff impact is based on information currently available and tariff programs announced as of April 30, not including announced tariff programs that are delayed or threatened," said Becton.  Becton Dickinson reported a total sales for the quarter of $5.27 billion, missing the Wall Street estimate of $5.35 billion, according to data compiled by LSEG.

headline: Becton Dickinson (BDX) Q2 Earnings Top Estimates

headline: Becton Dickinson: Fiscal Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: FRANKLIN LAKES, N.J. (AP) — Becton Dickinson and Co. (BDX) on Thursday reported fiscal second-quarter earnings of $308 million. The Franklin Lakes, New Jersey-based company said it had profit of $1.07 per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were $3.35 per share.

raw.headline: Becton Dickinson: Fiscal Q2 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: FRANKLIN LAKES, N.J. (AP) — Becton Dickinson and Co. (BDX) on Thursday reported fiscal second-quarter earnings of $308 million. The Franklin Lakes, New Jersey-based company said it had profit of $1.07 per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were $3.35 per share.

headline: BD (NYSE:BDX) Misses Q1 Sales Targets
summary: Medical technology company Becton, Dickinson and Company (NYSE:BDX) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025 as sales rose 4.5% year on year to $5.27 billion. On the other hand, the company’s outlook for the full year was close to analysts’ estimates with revenue guided to $21.85 billion at the midpoint. Its non-GAAP profit of $3.35 per share was 2.1% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
